alert.note: Alert for Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Platte County through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tracy, or over Platte City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Leavenworth, Platte City, Weatherby Lake, Weston, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point, Ferrelview, Tracy, Farley, Ridgely, Stillings, Beverly, Kansas City Intl Arpt, Hoover and East Leavenworth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 11 and 30. Interstate 435 between mile markers 23 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
